adrFormatAddress: 810 7th Ave 39th Floor, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text: Mariana was a lovely broker to work with! We just bought our first apartment in a co-op and were very overwhelmed by the entire process at first. Mariana has a lot of experience and was always open to answering any question we had. She was available at any time, always willing to give guidance, and had excellent referrals for lenders and attorneys. Our apartment is beautiful and the building is also really lovely. We really lucked out and owe her a lot for helping us get this place! Thank you so much!

text.text: Mariana was a lovely broker to work with! We just bought our first apartment in a co-op and were very overwhelmed by the entire process at first. originalText.text: Mariana is awesome! She helped me buy my first apt last year and she made the whole process as easy as possible. Being a first time homebuyer, she helped me understand things I should be paying attention to, questions to ask, etc. I wanted to move in a relatively quick period of time and Mariana worked diligently to find and show me as many apartments as we could. She made the whole process easier and more fun. Highly recommend!

originalText.text: I had a wonderful experience working with Mariana! She walked me through every step of my home purchasing process and it made everything significantly less stressful and intimidating. All went smoothly and it couldn't have happen without her guidance. Her positive attitude is infectious and highly admirable- Mariana is definitely the person you'd want to reach out to for real estate needs because she'll be your biggest advocate. Thank you for helping me get my dream home, Mariana :)

originalText.text: She made sure to show us every property that we could possibly be interested in, helped us negotiate our contract, and got us through all the hoops and hurdles to close. As first time home buyers we could not have found someone better to be our literal real estate Sherpa. We live in a beautiful home and are creating memories for forever and she is to thank. She is proactive, eager to go and see, and just knows how to make things happen/get it done. Highly recommend her!
